title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Cut the guanciale into strips and fry until crispy.
Mix the eggs, grated cheese, and pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving some water.
Mix the hot pasta, guanciale, and egg mixture quickly to form a creamy sauce. Add reserved water if needed.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill.
Add tomato paste, garam masala, and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in the heavy cream and grilled chicken.
Simmer until the sauce thickens. Serve with rice or naan.
